from sys import stdin
from bisect import bisect_left

def main():
    t = int(stdin.read().split()[0])
    for _ in range(t):
        n, c = map(int, stdin.read().split())
        s = stdin.read().split()[0]
        g = []
        c_pos = []
        for i in range(n):
            if s[i] == 'g':
                g.append(i)
            if s[i] == c:
                c_pos.append(i)
        first_g = g[0] if g else -1
        max_time = 0
        for pos in c_pos:
            idx = bisect_left(g, pos)
            if idx < len(g):
                next_g = g[idx]
            else:
                next_g = g[0] + n
            time = next_g - pos
            max_time = max(max_time, time)
        print(max_time)
